author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police are hunting for a man who attempted to break open the ATM of a nationalised bank in Royapettah during the early hours of Saturday.

According to police, the man could not break open the cash box, hence he fled the ATM situated on Chella Pillayar Koil Street. Based on a tip-off, the police rushed to the spot and took the CCTV footage from the facility.

The Anna Salai police have registered a case, further investigation is on.
title: Attempt to break open ATM
